name: Space Destroyers (Ismail_Alsaad)
description:
This is a game created for the 3rd WOWIE! game jam,
it is about a spaceship trying to survive as long as possible and killing as much invading ships as possible,
how the game fits the theme: (Failure is progress)
the more you miss hitting enemies the greater  the damage you deal and the more accurate your bullet get

the more you get hit the greater the base damage you deal

Hope you enjoy the game :)
